Class Place

java.lang.Object
org.pneditor.petrinet.models.lachguer.souissi.Place
public class Place extends Object
Represents a place in a PetriNet, which holds a certain number of tokens and manages incoming and outgoing arcs.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Place(int token)
    Constructor to initialize a Place with a given number of tokens.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description

    Adds an incoming arc to this place.

    Adds an outgoing arc to this place.
    void
    addToken(int n)
    Adds a specified number of tokens to this place.
    void
    emptyArcsList()
    Empties the lists of both incoming and outgoing arcs.
    void
    emptyPlace()
    Empties this place by setting the token count to zero.

  • Constructor Details

    • Place

      public Place(int token)
      Constructor to initialize a Place with a given number of tokens. Throws an exception if the initial token count is negative.
      Parameters:
      token - Initial number of tokens in the place

  • Method Details

    • getToken

      public int getToken()
      Gets the current number of tokens in this place.
      Returns:
      The number of tokens

    • addToken

      public void addToken(int n)
      Adds a specified number of tokens to this place. Throws an exception if the number is negative.
      Parameters:
      n - Number of tokens to add

    • removeToken

      public void removeToken(int n)
      Removes a specified number of tokens from this place. Throws an exception if the number is negative. If the current number of tokens is less than the number to remove, sets the token count to zero.
      Parameters:
      n - Number of tokens to remove

    • emptyPlace

      public void emptyPlace()
      Empties this place by setting the token count to zero.

    • getExArcs

      public ArrayList<ExArc> getExArcs()
      Gets the list of outgoing arcs from this place.
      Returns:
      List of outgoing arcs (ExArc)

    • getEnArcs

      public ArrayList<EnArc> getEnArcs()
      Gets the list of incoming arcs to this place.
      Returns:
      List of incoming arcs (EnArc)

    • addExArc

      public void addExArc(ExArc arc)
      Adds an outgoing arc to this place.
      Parameters:
      arc - The outgoing arc to add

    • addEnArc

      public void addEnArc(EnArc arc)
      Adds an incoming arc to this place.
      Parameters:
      arc - The incoming arc to add

    • emptyArcsList

      public void emptyArcsList()
      Empties the lists of both incoming and outgoing arcs.
